TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectCopyingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectCopyingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的事件发生时复制操作已完成，将所选的内容转换为所有指定的数据格式，已将所有数据格式都存储在关联的数据对象中，并可放置在系统剪贴板上的数据对象或设置为开始拖动操作。The attached event occurs when a copy operation has finished converting the selected content into all specified data formats, has stored all data formats in the associated data object, and is ready to put the data object on the system clipboard or to begin a drag operation. A附加的事件处理程序方法通常检查作为事件自变量，传入的数据对象的内容，并执行数据的对象，如添加、 移除或修改数据格式的自定义操作。A attached event handler method typically inspects the contents of the data object passed in as an event argument, and performs custom operations on the data object, such as adding, removing, or modifying data formats. 此处理程序方法也可能会通过调用取消复制事件。This handler method may also cancel the copying event by calling .
